description: This course explores the diverse modes of inquiry in the discipline of political science. Broadly centered around the question, "How do you know?," students focus on different methods of locating and collecting data, reviewing political texts and contested concepts, and constructing theoretical explanations of political phenomena. Prerequisite: one previous course in department.
name: Analyzing Politics

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: one previous course in department.

title: Analyzing Politics and Policies
